## IF.persona TRADER JOE: Opportunity & Arbitrage Analysis

### Does It Matter? (Ruthless Prioritization)
| Market | Matters? | Verdict |
|--------|----------|---------|
| Nigeria | NO | 32% inflation, currency risk, 12-18mo cycles. TAM porn. |
| Kenya | YES | M-Pesa ecosystem, stable macro, regulatory moat potential |
| Francophone | HELL YES | CFA stability, French credibility, zero competition |
| Rwanda | YES | Fast sales cycles (3-6mo), business-friendly gov |
| Ghana | NO | Cedi volatility, smaller market, distraction |

### Arbitrage Opportunities
1. FRANCOPHONE GEOGRAPHY ARBITRAGE (3-5x ROI, 18mo)
   - 8 countries, 200+ MFIs, $45M SAM
   - Zero localized competitors
   - Expected: 15-20 customers @ $40K = $600-800K ARR

2. "NOT-MIFOS" POSITIONING (2-3x ROI, 12mo)
   - 100+ MFIs tried Mifos, got burned
   - Fixed-price migration, 90-day guarantee
   - Expected: 8-12 migrations @ $60K = $480-720K ARR

3. DEBT RECOVERY VALUE CAPTURE (5-10x ROI, 6mo)
   - MFIs lose 15-25% to defaults
   - Price on outcomes: 0.5-1% of recovered debt
   - Expected: 50% revenue boost per customer

4. DIGITAL CREDIT COMPLIANCE (4-6x ROI, 24mo)
   - Kenya/Nigeria/Tanzania rolling out DCP regulations
   - Build CBK compliance module NOW
   - Expected: $300-500K ARR side business

### The 80/20 Playbook
DO:
1. Own Francophone Africa (40% of 24mo target)
2. Hunt Mifos refugees (60-90 day close cycles)
3. Value-based pricing on debt recovery

STOP:
1. Chasing Nigeria (macro chaos)
2. Building "AI features" (MFIs buy recovery rates)
3. Competing with Mambu (different market entirely)

### Fastest Path to $1M ARR (18 months)
- Francophone focus: 12 customers @ $45K = $540K
- Mifos migrations: 8 customers @ $50K = $400K
- Debt recovery upsells: 10 customers @ $20K = $200K
- TOTAL: $1.14M ARR
